name: Scairy Tales
description:
This game has some bugs and is not really finished.
But IT'S SOMETHING

Play at your own risk!

Move: WASD

Exit: Alt+F4 (after you found and rescued the princess)

Might be a bit spoopy. 

Loosely based on The Story of the Youth Who Went Forth to Learn What Fear Was (Grimms Brothers)

Might update it later (or not).
